thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Pacira Pharmaceuticals Reports Q4 GAAP EPS Of $0.11

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pacira Pharmaceuticals Reports Q4 GAAP EPS Of $0.11
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Pacira Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* PACIRA REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES BUSINESS UPDATE
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.38
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.11 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 8 PERCENT TO $79.1 MILLION * SEES ‍ 2018 EXPAREL NET PRODUCT SALES OF $300 MILLION TO $310 MILLION​
* SEES ‍ 2018 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS OF 70% TO 72%​
* SEES ‍ 2018 NON-GAAP RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT EXPENSE OF $50 MILLION TO $60 MILLION​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.10, REVENUE VIEW $79.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
